name: Easy Reader
author: Greg Priday

sections.description:
Easy Reader adds a button to all your posts. When your users click this, they’ll see an easy-to-read version of content. Check out the demo of Easy Reader – your readers will appreciate this feature.

Easy Reader also lets you add and customize a selection of social media badges at the bottom of your post (everyone loves to share).
sections.installation:
1. Extract the Easy Reader zip file into your plugin directory.
  2. Log in to your WordPress admin and active Easy Reader in the plugin manager.
  3. Go to Settings > Easy Reader to configure it.
sections.faq:
Will Easy Reader hide my ads?

When a user activates Easy Reader, it’ll hide the ads from your theme but not the ads you embedded in your post content.
